entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 180,165Chapters: 42/56Kudos: 274

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: Frisky
entry.summary:
Author: SinsTatum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,417Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: ‘What in the world is gonna make you listen? I got a bottle for two, and I feel a lil' frisky What in the world is (what in the world is) Gonna make you listen? I got a bottle for two, and I feel a lil' frisky Toast your December, baby (ooh-ooh) It's not the end of days (ooh-ooh) Oh, don't be so messy-headed (ooh-ooh) You'll have your revelation You're heavy-handed 'cause you hold it all (ooh-ooh) Step outside but not to brawl (ooh-ooh) And, watch you feet try not fall Or we'll make it to the moon all scraped and bruised up.’ ——————— It was a bit unfair how nice Dick looked in the fairy lights. Jason shouldn't be as distracted as he was by the way the lights surrounded the man in halo like glow. Seeing him caught in those warm lights got him feeling all warm and buzzy inside. Just looking at him and as an heavy challenge but then every time he felt those warm hands on his shoulders or brushing against his hips so casually felt like he was being struck again and again by those fucking escrima sticks.

entry.title: Bedfellows, Strange Not Unwelcome
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,625Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: Really it was sort of a miracle that they'd managed to have a full 24 hours away before they'd been called in by Alfred to answer a distress signal for Red Hood. Red Hood who, as it turned out, had decided to follow a lead on a case he'd been working with both of them on that they thought had hit a dead end for the moment, who was then unexpectedly outnumbered, and who they'd managed to stage a rescue for before he'd sustained severe injuries. Unfortunately, they hadn't managed to rescue him before he'd been injected with a truth serum of some kind. Which they hadn't discovered until Dick made the decision they should just sneak Jason back into their hotel room to recover for the night and then send him on his way back to Gotham. For Batship Winter/ Barbara Week Prompt: Only One Bed, Truth Serum, & Honeymoon

entry.title: Call Me Little Sunshine
entry.summary:
Author: arakhnoidsilk

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,900Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 21

Summary: "That's such a… You song." He felt himself say in a hushed tone, before he managed to tear his gaze away from Dick."Is it?" He asked Jason back, who found his own nerves melt away. The teenager nodded slowly. Dick continued to hum, the lyrics slipping from his lips, softly, almost like a prayer swirling in the wind."Call out in the middle of the night, for when else would I hear you? Fall out in the cold starlight, I can save you if you do,"Jason felt himself sway at the melody. If he ignored everything else around him, he could pretend that Dick was singing that song to him. He only ever had his mother singing for him when he was still a small child, and she had to take care of him and not the other way around.It was a nice thought, wasn't it? To have your crush singing to you one of the songs from the band you recommended. Too bad that his love was unrequired, but that was alright to Jason. He had already been taken in by a billionaire and made Robin, his luck could only do so much, he knew.or; 5 times Dick and Jason sing for comfort +1 in which they don't need it anymore.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 198,270Chapters: 42/53Kudos: 1,530

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Never Pretend
entry.summary:
Author: Zillabird

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,809Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 36

Summary: Dick Grayson was a gold medal figure skater. Until he wasn't. Now he's a hockey player for the Gotham Ravagers, of which Jason Todd is center and captain. Neither of them are sure what to do about it. Dick is stuck with his contract, whether he likes it or not, and Jason needs to get his team on board with the unusual recruit. Out on the ice, somewhere between the life Dick left behind and the controlling machinations of the team owner, is a chance to find a new place to start for both of them.

entry.title: You're Gonna Take It From Me (I'm Gonna Give It To You)
entry.summary:
Author: Starless_Void

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,705Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 128

Summary: Jason makes his way back to Gotham about a year after his big fight with Bruce. He hunkers down in a new apartment, staying as far under the radar as possible to avoid any contact with the Bats- who would probably throw him in Arkham the first chance they got. If only that were his only problem. On top of staying out of the attention of the most paranoid people on the planet, Jason is trying to find a way to undo a stupid spell that has left him in a rather strange state. Returning to Gotham is probably up there in the stupidest decisions he's ever made, but it's his home too. As long as he lays low, doesn't rebuild his criminal empire, and keeps to himself, there shouldn't be any reason for the Bats to bother him.   Dick Grayson has lost Jason twice now. There won't be a third.
